doc: Nokia account user information, see https://health.nokia.com
name: user

fields.name: first
fields.doc: The first name of the user

fields.name: last
fields.doc: The last name of the user

fields.name: gender
fields.doc: The gender of the user (0 -> female, 1 -> male)

fields.name: birthday
fields.doc: The birthday of the user as a unix timestamp

fields.name: height
fields.doc: The height of the user in centimeters

fields.name: weight
fields.doc: The weight of the user in grams

fields.name: withingsId
fields.doc: The unique identifier assigned to the user by Withings
